reviews.review: what an amazing movie one of my all time favorites

Avengers: Infinity War is a culmination of everything Marvel has been working towards for a decade. In its favour are an incredible cast, that trademark MCU humour and some stunning action sequences but these are offset by an infuriating ending and a lack of emotional heft to the film's inevitable darker moments. SO GOOOOD Black Pather Iron Spider Keep It Up

This movie has gotten more flak from the critics than it deserved. to give it the credit it does deserve, I need to separate this review into parts.
Story
Incase you have not seen the original infinity war comic, its complicated as hell. Now what this does is that instead of saying that thanos is the bad guy because he's the bad guy, it gives him an actual arguable reason thats somewhat understandable to be a justification. The movie also took a lot of risks in killing off certain characters that would definitly be fan favorite like spiderman and Black panther. Speaking of black panther, I am glad that the twins decided not to shove any social politics down our throat in this movie as while it can be an ok tool, its used way to many times today and when used, its usually in a way that hurts rather than helping the story.
Music
The music in this was probably the best part of this movie as for the entire two and a half hours, its orchestra played perfect music that lined up perfectly with the movie. And Orchestral soundtracks can always help any medium. If you don't believe me then I would like to move your attention to the mario galaxy games, where its orchestral sound track created amazing and beautiful works. so for this to be incorporated into a full movie is amazing.
References
Now this is a quick note as I found a nice little reference to the original infinity war comic where hulk falls into the staircase of dr strange and warns him about thanos. It alligns almost perfectly with the original comics scene where silver surfer falls down onto dr strange's stair case and warns him about thanos.
CGI
Now i think the most inconcistent part of the movie was the cgi where sometimes, cgi would make it seem that thanos was powerful enough to throw a moon at iron man while it made it seem like the hulk buster suit was just not that beliveable.
Overall grade: 
I give this movie a 9 out of 10 due to everything but the cgi, if it could just be a little better than it would get that perfect score of 10/10 but for now we have to settle with what we got.

Avengers: Infinity War is a great movie and it's nice to see all of your favorite superheroes come together to fight the biggest enemy yet, Thanos.
Change is not easy to digest.  Movie was a bit heavy on violence.  But MCU seems to be going darker.
I really love this movie. Its clear, tear-jerking ending. All though the hulkbuster effects were kind of unfinished. But  a great film, can't wait for part 2
The best Marvel villain and movie yet, is practically a Thanos movie because he is the protagonist not the Avengers

Dont be dismayed by the rotten tomato score, Avengers: Infinity War ranks as one of the best MCU movies. It accomplishes this accolade by having one of the greatest villians ever, brilliant action, staying true to the source material in ways that it matters and changing it to its benefit. Avengers IW will leave you wide eyed and jaw on the floor by the time you walk out the movie theater
